effect.name: Blur Real
effect.description:
This shader applies a smooth blur effect to an image by averaging pixel colors across multiple nearby points, with the blur intensity and number of iterations controlled by user parameters. It works by sampling the texture at several offset positions around each pixel and combining them to create a softened, blurred appearance.
Notes: DirectX 9 Pixel Shader version 3.0 is broken on Fusion for a long time, more specifically the texture coordinates, so this shader may not work.
effect.author: Sphax - Flavien Clermont

parameter.name: Coeff
parameter.description: Blur offset coefficient for one step
